abstract.para: This procedure assumes that you already have the base operating system installed on cluster nodes as well as the &rke2; &kube; distribution installed and operational. If you are installing from scratch, refer to first.

step.para: Install the &nvoperator; on the cluster as described in .
Connect the &kube; cluster to &ranchermanager; as described in
Configure the GPU-enabled nodes so that the &productname; containers are assigned to Pods that run on nodes equipped with &nvidia; GPU hardware. Find more details about assigning Pods to nodes in .
Install and configure &ssecurity; to scan the nodes used for &productname;. Although this step is not required, we strongly encourage it to ensure the security in the production environment.
Install and configure &sobservability; to observe the nodes used for &productname; application. Refer to for more details.
